title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 18.11 - Federal government review of invoice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 18.11 - Federal government review of invoice

State Regulations
(a) The MIR date shall be determined in
accordance with subdivision (b) of this section whenever a proper invoice must
be examined by the Federal government prior to payment. (b) The MIR date shall be the original MIR
date increased by a number of days equal to the number of days between the date
that the agency transmits the invoice to the Federal government for examination
and the date that the agency receives the invoice from the Federal
government. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
18.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
